item.title: Amazon Prime Members Get These 16 Free Games In January
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/amazon-prime-members-get-these-16-free-games-in-january/1100-6528732/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f

GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Amazon has revealed its first batch of free PC games on Prime Gaming in 2025, and this month, subscribers can add classic sequels and zombie-slaying shooters to their collection. As a reminder, once you claim the free games from Prime Gaming, they are yours to keep forever--even if your subscription expires. If you aren't a member, you can sign up for Amazon Prime for as little as one month to take advantage of the subscription and score some great freebies.

The first wave of releases are now available, and one of the highlights here is BioShock 2 Remastered. The 2010 sequel saw players return to the ruined undersea city of Rapture as one of the infamous Big Daddy enforcers. Players were able to explore the fallen metropolis, and the game's gunplay and storytelling was further refined. This remaster also added major graphical upgrades alongside the fun Protector Trials mode.

You can also check out the side-scrolling action-RPG Eastern Exorcist, puzzle game The Bridge, and a few other interesting titles right now. Starting January 16, you'll can claim games like the action-racer GRIP, check out an RPG set in the SteamWorld universe, and attempt to discover if you are indeed smarter than a fifth-grader.

On January 23, you can catch up with JC Denton in the original Deus Ex, push back against the undead Nazi menace in Zombie Army 4, and enjoy some hypnotic beats in Spitlings. Finally, you can claim Blood West, Super Meat Boy Forever, and Ender Lilies: Quietus of the Knights on January 30.

Prime Gaming free games for January 2025

Available now

  • Eastern Exorcist
  • The Bridge
  • BioShock 2 Remastered
  • SpiritMancer
  • SkyDrift Infinity

January 16

  • GRIP: Combat Racing
  • SteamWorld Quest: Hand of Gilgamech
  • Are You Smarter Than A 5th Grader

January 23

  • Deus Ex: Game of the Year Edition
  • To The Rescue
  • Star Stuff
  • Spitlings
  • Zombie Army 4: Dead War

January 30

  • Ender Lilies: Quietus of the Knights
  • Blood West
  • Super Meat Boy Forever

Prime subscribers will also be able to the following games in January via the Prime Gaming Luna channel:

  • Guacamelee 2: Complete Edition
  • Metro Exodus
  • Super Meat Boy
  • Airhead
  • The Magical Mixture Mill
  • Fallout 3: Game of the Year Edition
  • Fallout New Vegas: Ultimate Edition
  • Fortnite
  • Lego Fortnite
  • Rocket Racing
  • Fortnite Festival
  • Trackmania
Darryn Bonthuys on Google+

Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com
